meanings.definition: Impressions made by the hands on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The children proudly displayed their colorful handprints on the classroom wall.
meanings.sent2: The artist left her handprints in wet clay to create a unique design.
meanings.sent3: The handprints on the window looked like a secret code only the kids could decipher.
meanings.sent4: Her handprints on my heart will never fade, a lasting memory of our friendship.
meanings.sent5: The detective found handprints at the scene, a clue to unravel the mystery.

meanings.definition: A mark left by the hand on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The handprints in the cement sidewalk showed the passage of time.
meanings.sent2: She wiped away the handprints on the mirror to see her reflection clearly.
meanings.sent3: The handprints on the cake were a sweet reminder of a messy baking session.
meanings.sent4: His handprints on the document indicated his approval and agreement.
meanings.sent5: The handprints on the wall told a silent story of a playful moment shared.
